title: Simple Units Conversion Sinter Test
description: A simple test for testing unit conversion, it just puts in 2 values and gets them out again in the correct units
author: Jim Leek

in.boil.celsius.description: Input the boiling point of water in Celsius

in.boil.fahrenheit.description: Input the boiling point of water in Fahrenheit

in.misc.kelvin.description: Abs zero, Freezing water, boiling water

out.boil.celsius.description: Input the boiling point of water in Celsius

out.boil.fahrenheit.description: Input the boiling point of water in Fahrenheit

out.misc.kelvin.description: Abs zero, Freezing water, boiling water
